steps: step 2: Login at Page_home --> navigate to Page_inventory_html
step 3: At Page_inventory_html click on hyperlink_item_4_title_link --> navigate to Page_inventory-item_html
step 4: At Page_inventory-item_html click on button_remove_sauce_labs_backpack
step 5: At Page_inventory-item_html click on div_object
step 6: At Page_inventory-item_html click on hyperlink_object --> navigate to Page_cart_html
step 7: At Page_cart_html click on button_checkout --> navigate to Page_checkout-step-one_html
step 8: At Page_checkout-step-one_html click on input_first_name
step 9: At Page_checkout-step-one_html input on input_first_name
step 10: At Page_checkout-step-one_html click on input_first_name
step 11: At Page_checkout-step-one_html input on input_last_name
step 12: At Page_checkout-step-one_html click on input_first_name
step 13: At Page_checkout-step-one_html input on input_postal_code
step 14: At Page_checkout-step-one_html click on input_continue --> navigate to Page_checkout-step-two_html
step 15: At Page_checkout-step-two_html click on button_finish --> navigate to Page_checkout-complete_html
step 16: Add visual checkpoint at Page_checkout-complete_html
